failure.message:
1 expectation failed. JSON path email[0] doesn't match. Expected: (a string ending with "@rod.com" or a string containing "@rod.org" or a string containing "@rod.net" or a string containing "@rod.de" or a string containing "@rod.us" or a string containing "@rod.co.uk" or a string containing "@rod.biz") Actual: Lura@rod.tv
